item.title: Subdue the Earth?
item.description: Dominion Given In the book of Genesis, we see God give humanity dominion over all of creation. He instruct humans to subdue the earth.a Does this mean we can do whatever we want? After all, we've got dominion!b. We are to subdue creation!c Let's look in the second chapter for some insight: And the LORD God took the man, and put him into the garden of Eden to dressd it and to keepe it.

item.title: It All Works Together
item.description: Perhaps you've seen this verse: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose. Romans 8:28 NIV Let's look at what some of these words mean. Know eidw (i'-do) perceive, see, be sure, tell, understand, wish All Things pas (pä's) each, every, any, all, the whole, everyone, all things, everything Work Together

item.title: Raise the Standard
item.description: Have you heard this scripture... When the enemy shall come in like a flood, the Spirit of the Lord shall lift up a standard against him. Isaiah 59:19b KJV But What Does "Standard" Mean Here? The word "standard" originates from Middle English, and refers to a flag raised on a pole as a rallying point in battle. It is an object that soldiers can look for to find where allies are.
